column5: Looking for a smaller resort on LOW. Has anyone used Moonlight Bay Camp?

Stayed there a couple of years ago. Mike offers a great package deal with the american plan plus guide for a reasonable price. The resort and cabins are very clean and the shore lunches were fantastic. We're doing housekeeping plan now at mylies. Can't go wrong at either place.
If you are looking for something smaller, then MBC is a great choice. Mike and staff will take good care of you.
